thread.title: GH Recap: Jason tries to stop Sonny from making a mistake
thread.title_full: GH Recap: Jason tries to stop Sonny from making a mistake

title: GH Recap: Jason tries to stop Sonny from making a mistake
text:
GH Recap: Jason tries to stop Sonny from making a mistake 
Dustin Cushman Thursday, February 9th, 2017 
Thursday February 9, 2017: Sonny goes after Ava, Liv threatens Julian, Alexis admits to her girls she's an alcoholic, and Jordan confesses to Andre. Pin 
This summary began at 3:01 PM [EST] due to local news at the start of the hour. 
At the station, Jordan apologizes to Curtis for doubting him, and admits he was right that she doesn’t want him working here because it complicates things with Andre. She would like them to be friends if he can respect their boundaries. Curtis doesn’t want to be her friend because she doesn’t respect him, and he storms out. Andre walks in and sees Curtis leaving in a huff, so he confronts Jordan about what is going on between them. Jordan confesses to the kiss she shared with Curtis, but swears it made her realize she loves Andre. Andre doesn’t feel she is committed to him or them, and he won’t pretend to be blind to this or be the other guy. Andre tells her it’s time they break up. 
At Sonny’s, Dante informs Carly that Sonny is gone. She doesn’t know where he is, so Dante thinks they should ask Jason. 
Related: Join General Hospital stars at the 2017 SoapFest Charity Weekend 
Jason meets with Julian at the hospital, where Julian tells him that Ava is not involved with any of his drama. As they talk, Liv steps out of the elevator and walks by. Julian says he must go and rushes after Liv. Jason gets a text from Carly asking him to come to the house as Sonny is in trouble. Meanwhile, Julian asks Liv why she is following him. She tells him that she doesn’t trust him, and reminds him that he killed Duke, the only man she ever loved. 
Sam drops by Alexis’ place and fills her mom in on the baby’s heart rate problems, but that Dr. Lee is keeping track of things. Suddenly Kristina and Molly burst in with champagne to celebrate their mother being reinstated as a lawyer. Alexis breaks the news to her daughters that she didn’t get her license back because she must focus on getting well. She admits to them that she’s an alcoholic and details the extent of her problem over the past few months. Alexis hopes her girls can forgive her. Sam forgives her, but Kristina holds a grudge against her mother for always being self-righteous and judging her, but now that she’s in the wrong she wants to be forgiven. She won’t forgive her mother, but. Molly does. Alexis cries that she will do whatever she can to make it up to Kristina, but Kristina storms out. Molly goes after her sister, and Sam comforts Alexis. After the girls have left, Liv drops by to check on Alexis. Alexis brings her up to speed on Kristina hating her, and the problem with Sam’s baby. 
More: Upcoming General Hospital fan events featuring Laura Wright and Tyler Christopher 
Sonny visits Ava at the gallery and blames her for Morgan’s death. She flashes back to switching his pills, and blurts out she didn’t mean it to go that far. He yells she planted a bomb, which makes her realize Sonny doesn’t know about the pills. She swears to Sonny that she had nothing to do with the bomb, but Sonny tells her that he knows about her and Julian’s clubhouse, and he heard the recording of Julian crying about being afraid of his sister. Ava fishes behind her back and for her purse, but Sonny stops her and grabs her gun from it and points it at her. Ava begs him not to do this and screams she had nothing to do with the bomb. 
Jason arrives at Sonny’s and learns he broke house arrest. Jason tells Dante that he’ll handle this and leaves. Carly begs Dante to let Jason do this as he’s the only one Sonny may listen to. Carly argues with Dante about Sonny, and tells him that Sonny knows she’ll leave him if he resorts to violence. 
Curtis meets with Hayden at The Floating Rib to catch up. Hayden vents about the problems with the hospital budget, which may result in laying of one third of the nurses. She asks why he looks so down, and he tells her about his women troubles. Meanwhile, Sam, Molly and arrive to cool down. Julian shows up and eavesdrops on them as they discuss Sam’s baby. 
Jason arrives at the gallery to find Sonny holding Ava’s gun on her. He tells Sonny to put the gun down, but Sonny is positive that Ava is the one. Jason tries to reason with Sonny and tell him that the police have cleared him in the bombing, and Dante arrived to tell him this, but now he’s broken house arrest to kill Ava. Jason points out he will lose everything if he does this. 
Liv says to Sam, “We were just talking about you.” 
Andre tells Jordan to admit he is not who she wants. 
Hayden and Tracy try to decide who to let go. 
Epiphany gathers the nurses to organize a strike. 
Anna arrives at the hospital and asks Felix for help. 
Dante tells Carly he can’t wait any longer. 
Jason begs Sonny to put the gun in his hand and go home.
